metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24697 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in PowerDNS Authoritative through 4.3.0 when --enable-experimental-gss-tsig is used. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can cause a denial of service by sending crafted queries with a GSS-TSIG signature.

notes.Note: sbeattie> likely unaffected due to Debian packages not built with experimental GSS-TSIG support

criterions.comment: pdns package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
